title: Navbar responsiveness on mobile devices
description: Verify the Navbar adapts correctly on mobile screen sizes with hidden buttons accessible via hamburger menu or alternatives.

steps.description: Resize screen to typical mobile width (e.g. 375px width).
Check Navbar changes to mobile layout with hamburger menu visible.
Click the hamburger menu.
Validate that all navigation buttons are accessible within the expanded menu.
Navigate using each menu item.
Confirm navigation links lead to corresponding sections with correct scrolling behavior.

title: Hero text correct wrapping on tablet screen widths
description: Ensure hero section text wraps correctly without awkward line breaks or overflow on tablet widths between 600px and 768px.

steps.description: Resize viewport to tablet width e.g. 700px.
Observe hero text wrapping behavior and verify absence of awkward breaks or overflow.

title: Feature grid layout responsiveness
description: Validate that the features grid adjusts column counts correctly for different screen widths, including when the number of feature items is uneven.

steps.description: Set screen width to small (e.g. 500px).
Confirm features are displayed in single column layout.
Set screen width to medium (600px - 768px).
Confirm features are displayed in an appropriate two-column layout with proper alignment.
Set screen width to desktop (e.g. 1024px or larger).
Confirm features are displayed using default multi-column grid ensuring even spacing and alignment.

title: Validate image asset paths and optimized loading
description: Check that all image assets (screenshots, usage steps) load successfully without 404 errors and file sizes are optimized under 500KB.

steps.description: Load the landing page.
Verify all images appear as expected with no broken links.
Use browser devtools to inspect image network requests.
Confirm file sizes for images are less than or equal to 500KB.

title: Accessibility validation of image alt texts
description: Validate that all images on the landing page have descriptive alt texts to meet accessibility standards.

steps.description: Inspect every image element on the page.
Check each image has a non-empty, descriptive alt attribute.

title: Smooth scrolling navigation functionality
description: Test navigation links that scroll to page sections perform smooth scrolling with scroll-padding preventing navbar overlap.

steps.description: Click each internal navigation link from the Navbar and other navigational components.
Confirm page scrolls smoothly to the target section.
Verify each target section heading is visible and not obscured by the fixed navbar.

title: External links correctness validation
description: Verify all external links, especially the Download button's GitHub URL and footer support links, point to the correct URLs and open as expected.

steps.description: Click the Download button.
Confirm redirection to the latest GitHub release URL.
Click each support/contact footer link.
Verify each link directs to the appropriate external resource or contact method.

title: Version constants centralized usage
description: Check that all version strings displayed on the site (e.g. hero badge) reference a single constants file ensuring consistency.

steps.description: Inspect code or run tests to retrieve version strings displayed on the UI.
Compare version strings to confirm they all match the centralized constant file.

title: SEO elements correctness
description: Confirm that SEO elements such as <title>, <meta name="description">, and favicon are correctly set in the HTML head.

steps.description: View page source or use devtools to inspect the <head> section.
Verify page <title> matches expected SEO title.
Check <meta name="description"> is present and accurate.
Confirm favicon is loaded and matches the expected replacement.

title: Lighthouse audit for Largest Contentful Paint and image loading
description: Execute Lighthouse audit on the landing page to assess page speed, especially LCP metric, and identify image loading strategy effectiveness such as lazy loading below the fold.

steps.description: Run Lighthouse audit targeting performance metrics including LCP.
Verify LCP score meets performance targets or document improvement suggestions.
Confirm below-the-fold images are lazy loaded or appropriately optimized.

title: Keyboard navigation accessibility support
description: Validate that the entire website, especially navigation elements and interactive controls, supports keyboard navigation and focus visibility.

steps.description: Use keyboard (Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter) to navigate through all interactive page elements.
Confirm all links, buttons, and menus are accessible and usable via keyboard only.
Verify visible focus indicators are present on active/focused elements.

title: Footer links validation
description: Check all links in the footer section are operational, point to correct destinations, and are visually consistent.

steps.description: Click each link in the footer.
Ensure each link navigates to the intended page or resource without errors.
